statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 13 \\ 15 \\ 14 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 7 \\ 9 \\ 9 \\ 5 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
